name: Fishing Village
description:
Mix of puzzle game and managing/building game. 

Build a fishing village from puzzle elements, just don't ruin the fishing business. Place fishermen far apart each other as they need a space to fish, but at the same time keep them close enough to ensure them food.

Art and code made by myself during 48h, sfx from freesound.org

Made by Imilkowski Dev for Mix and Game Jam 2020

https://twitter.com/imilkowski_b
